page.title: 10VISIT TO THE BARRACKS
page.content: On the 12 of June which was a Wednesday we went to see Major Williams at the Light Division Barracks.Sophie and I expected that Major Williams to be in uniform and was going to be very strict but he was quite the oposite.He was dressed in home clothes, but all the soldiers were dressed in proper uniform.He had a small room.He had models of Flowerdown and gave us a map and a book of dress wear.Major Williams was a very friendly man and even said we could ring if we had forgotten anything.He said that the people were glad that Flowerdown is a barracks not a jail.
